name: CZ's Adventure
description:
CZ's on an adventure to help as many farmers as he can!

  • Left click to move
  • Right click to attack
  • G to interact

Assets used:

  • Easy Primitive Animals - Farm Edition (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/easy-primitive-anima...)
  • Easy Primitive People (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/easy-primitive-people-161846)
  • Handpainted Grass & Ground Textures (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/handpainted-grass-gr...)
  • Simple Farm - Cartoon Assets(https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/industrial/simple-farm-car...)
  • Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/low-poly-simple...)
  • FREE Casual Game SFX Pack (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...)
  • Ultimate Animated Animal Pack (https://quaternius.com/packs/ultimateanimatedanimals.html)
